name: Easy Come Easy Go
content: Hey I’m gonna sing you a little song
So you know goes like this
There are times in our life
When it just don’t add up
When we don’t get it right
And we’re fed up
Well  easy come and easy go again
It’s not unfair; it’s simply how it is
So easy come and go again
Hey easy come and easy go again
It’s let it rip and take it on the chin
I said easy come and go again
You've been reaching too far
You've been trying too much
You've been losing yourself
So out
Hey easy come and easy go again
It’s not unfair; it’s simply how it is
Say easy come and go again
I said easy come and easy go again
It’s let it rip and take it on the chin
I said easy come
Hey easy come and easy go again
It’s let it rip and take it on the chin
I said easy come and go again
